publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1696 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSIsâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the following instruments be approved: Special Grant Report No. 1, Special Grant for Scotland Asylum Seekers Assistance (SE 2001/60) and, Special Grant Report No. 2, Special Grant for Scotland Kosovan Evacuees (SE 2001/61) and, The Highlands and Islands Area of Operation (Scotland) Order 2001.
